channel.title: recruiting on Matthew Haffner
channel.description: Recent content in recruiting on Matthew Haffner

item.title: The geography of Oklahoma State football recruiting
item.description: Introduction Anyone who reads listens to Gundy’s press conferences around signing day or reads PFB articles on recruiting knows that Oklahoma State Football’s recruiting practices are heavily scrutinized. The writers of PFB have pointed out that Gundy’s attitude toward recruiting seems to have changed. Where the mantra used to be “recruiting is the most important thing we do,” it now seems less important.
